DOC.criteria: Subjects type 2 diabetes mellitus ( diet exercise treat , treat specific oral antidiabetic ( metformin , sulfonylureas glinides ) mono combination therapy ) diagnose least 3 month previously BMI 18.5 40 kg/m2 HbA1c 6.5 10.0 % inclusive Known suspect allergy trial product relate product Previous participation trial ( randomise ) .
